directions.step:
1. SLICE SAUSAGE INTO 2 OZ PATTIES.
2. PLACE PATTIES ON SHEET PANS (18 BY 26-INCHES); BAKE IN 350 F. OVEN 25 MINUTES OR UNTIL WELL DONE. :
NOTE: SAUSAGE SHOULD BE COOKED UNTIL INSIDE IS GRAY WITH NO TINGE OF PINK REMAINING AND INTERNAL TEMPERATURE IS 170 F.
Recipe Number: L08901
SERVING SIZE: 2 PATTIES
From the <Army Master Recipe Index File> (actually used today!). Downloaded from Glen's MM Recipe Archive, http://www.erols.com/hosey.
